reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 352/03: DELEGATION OF POWERS, DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
reg_info.reg_name_text: delegation of powers, duties and responsibilities
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 352/03: DELEGATION OF POWERS, DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
reg_info.act_under: Improving Customer Service for Road Users Act, 2001

content.content: 1. The powers, duties and responsibilities in the following provisions are to be delegated by agreement to Plenary Americas DES LP: 1.  Clause 32 (5) (a), subclause 32 (5) (b) (i) and clause 32 (5) (c) of the Highway Traffic Act. 2.  Subsection 58 (2) of the Highway Traffic Act, but only in so far as it relates to the issuance of a temporary driving instructor licence. 3.  Sections 2.1, 3, 3.1, 23.0.1, 24, subsections 26 (4), 29 (6), (9) and (10) and section 30 of Ontario Regulation 340/94 (Drivers’ Licences) made under the Highway Traffic Act. 4.  Section 3 of Ontario Regulation 341/94 (Driver Licence Examinations) made under the Highway Traffic Act. O. Reg. 310/23, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The powers, duties and responsibilities in the following provisions are to be delegated by agreement to Plenary Americas DES LP:

1.  Clause 32 (5) (a), subclause 32 (5) (b) (i) and clause 32 (5) (c) of the Highway Traffic Act.

2.  Subsection 58 (2) of the Highway Traffic Act, but only in so far as it relates to the issuance of a temporary driving instructor licence.

3.  Sections 2.1, 3, 3.1, 23.0.1, 24, subsections 26 (4), 29 (6), (9) and (10) and section 30 of Ontario Regulation 340/94 (Drivers’ Licences) made under the Highway Traffic Act.

4.  Section 3 of Ontario Regulation 341/94 (Driver Licence Examinations) made under the Highway Traffic Act. O. Reg. 310/23, s. 1.

content.content: 2. The delegation referred to in section 1 becomes effective on September 3, 2023. O. Reg. 310/23, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 2. The delegation referred to in section 1 becomes effective on September 3, 2023. O. Reg. 310/23, s. 1.
